Title: Sand Hill Shuffle
Writer: Clay Tarver, Mike Judge (created by), John Altschuler (created by), Dave Krinsky (created by), Carson Mell (executive story editor), Amy Aniobi (story editor), Dan Lyons (staff writer)
Actors: Thomas Middleditch, T.J. Miller, Josh Brener, Martin Starr
Plot: Monica deals with her new boss; Richard makes a decision about the company's future.
